session_info.name: TUIXGD - Invited Orals:Beam Instrumentation, Controls, Feedback and Op. Aspects

papers.title: Accurate and Confident Prediction of Electron Beam Longitudinal Properties Using Spectral Virtual Diagnostics
authors: Longitudinal phase space measurement is one of the key diagnostics in FEL machines. In this work it is shown as the application of machine learning based virtual diagnostics can provide undirect information on the longitudinal phase space of the beam in a non intercepting way and
in combination with standard longitudinal diagnostics methods
helps overcoming resolution limitations and increasing the accuracy of the measured data.
